name: color-claim-sass
description: color-claim-sass is a color library, with a set of accompanying functions, classes and mixins. They are based on Tobias van Schneider's Color Claim. See all the color swatches over at http://www.vanschneider.com/colors/

scripts.build: node-sass --include-path scss scss/color-claim.scss css/color-claim.css && node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path scss scss/color-claim.scss css/color-claim.min.css

author: Jeroen Peeters <contact@jeroenpeeters.me>
